title: Pes jee main admission preference list !!!
content:
Only 4 preferences can be submitted now I am not sure why it is like this   
but is this gonna be considered in 1st councelling round in june or will a different preference list come out at that time??

comments.body:
bhai same yrr, i got 94.7%ile i put my pref as cs and then aiml for first rr then ec campus...

apprently you should prefer the campus over the branch dk fs tho

idk why there is only 4 preferences

but i think you might get ece in ec campus tho definetly i just hope i get cse

why did you go for aiml before core CSE?
CSE has a higher cut-off and there's a chance you may not get a seat if you take cse at lower percentile's than others . Last time a guy with 94% got in while a guy with 96 or something didn'tÂ

so what is the conclusion? should my pref list be same or whut?

https://preview.redd.it/31nb5l7j0rwe1.png?width=1604&format=png&auto=webp&s=4d394a683954e135229b8f4b77a02fed88555e17

yeah that's what I had put earlier   
but I changed it according to my worst conditions  
but if I was in your position I would actually have the same dilema ki kya dalun but try kar ece koi campus ka dalne ke liye agar teko lagra ki 100% ho jaega

worst conditions? we got pretty similar percentile, i am not interested in ece at all soo much ratta bruh ///

i just hope aiml is guarantedd in EC campus atleast T\_T

yo dude i asked PES U , last yr the cutoff for cse was 99%ile for cse and cse aiml, but that was when only 5%of the seats were allocated for jee mains,

but now 40% of the seats are allocated , simple calculations from chat gpt tells that.

https://preview.redd.it/3t6vlgos5rwe1.png?width=625&format=png&auto=webp&s=1fd5711ebbe72e1a9b05aac4af5b9318a7077072

surely, 80 k rank can land me in aiml in rr minimum T\_T

they will release the merit list soon too so fingers crossed

bro 99% is wrong I have people joined in 97 and 98 that too on reddit itself their jee ranks aren't transparent at all   
so we have to just wait   
check dm
I am also waiting ,Good percentile ,When are they releasing it btw?
I've got 91.94 %ile i.e. 119800 Rank. Any chances of me getting CSE like anything core or aiml in rr or ec campus.
What about 93.47? Atleast ec campus cse possible?
Bhai same here .. 91.97 .. hopefully I get cse aiml in electronic city
